system.description: This spell functions like legend lore, except that it works more quickly but produces some strain. You pose a question about a person, place, or object and cast the spell. If the subject is at hand or you are in the place, succeed on a caster level check (1d20 + caster level, max +25) against DC 20 for a vision. If only detailed information is known, DC 25 and information is incomplete. If only rumors are known, DC 30 and information is vague.
